resources.string: View, edit and delete the application"'"s shared preferences files. \nClicking on one of the files will display this file"'"s content. \nThere are 2 buttons for each file - one for editing the file, the other for deleting it.

View the application"'"s internal databases. \nClicking on one of the databases will open a list of all the tables that are stored in that database.\nClicking on one of the tables will display this table data.

View the folders and files in the application"'"s internal storage. \nClicking on one of the folders will display this folder content. \nClicking on one of the files will display this file"'"s information.
AndroidDevTool library is a tool for easy debugging of the application"'"s internal files, like: shared preferences files, SQLite databases and regular files. Open the menu to get started.
